name: The Pit of Despair (hulkmeistercoder)
description: The Pit of Despair is a platformer puzzle game demo for the May Day Mental Health Jam. The objective is to get out of the pit by solving the puzzle with the stone blocks. The stone blocks represent obstacles or mental blocks that can make us feel depressed. The idea of the game is that we can get out of the pit with self-effort and with a bit of help from nature. 🍄
